ontocomAgent.mediator
Class Mediator

java.lang.Object
  ontocomAgent.mediator.Mediator

public class Mediator
extends java.lang.Object

Class responsible to conduct the mediation of information agent. When able to manipulate the information that the agent is dealing, it is queried in the ontology. Next is returned to this mediating layer, so that it can return information to the agent.

Mediator

public Mediator(java.lang.String ontology,
                java.lang.String agentMessage,
                int codContent)
Constructor of the class.

Parameters:
ontology - path where is the .owl file ontology.
agentMessage - path where is the agent message.txt or the agent message in plain text.
codContent - code that represents the message format agent. In Communication javadoc has more details (0 if parameter agentMessage own message in plain text or 1 if the parameter own path to a .txt file with the message in KQML).

getInfoSubject

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInfoSubject(MethodsSPARQL sparql,
                                                            java.lang.String[] queryConcepts)

Perform a search where every word is consulted in the ontology, checking if the word is part of some content (information from individual/subject). If the word is in the comment of a class, it is checked whether it is a synonym.

Returns:
ArrayList containing all information found.

filterSymbols

public java.lang.String filterSymbols(java.lang.String normalWord)

Function to clean words with special characters.

Parameters:
normalWord - the word to be removed special characters
Returns:
new word without special characters

getSpecialChars

public java.lang.String getSpecialChars(java.lang.String simpleWord,
                                        java.lang.String wordSpecialChars)

A simple method to add special characters, from one reference word, in a new word.

Parameters:
simpleWord - a simple word without special characters
wordSpecialChars - a word with special characters
Returns:
a new word with simpleWord plus special characters

hasSpecialChars

public boolean hasSpecialChars(java.lang.String testWord)

Method for testing a string to search for special characters.

Parameters:
testWord - word to be tested
Returns:
true if there is at least one special character, false otherwise

getKnowledgeRelation

public void getKnowledgeRelation()

This method provide a way to replace words by ontology relations in a agent message. The message result is set in this.message if the agent message is in String, otherwise will set in KMQL txt file.

  1. is recognized object properties.
  2. is searched on ontology, the domain and the range about object properties found.
  3. each domain and range is matched with others remaining words in agent message.
  4. each relation is inserted into agent message replacing their respective words.

getOntologyPrefix

public java.lang.String getOntologyPrefix()

Use a method do return an actual ontology URI prefix.

Returns:
a String with ontology URI

getMajorSynonym

public java.lang.String getMajorSynonym(java.lang.String[][] fuzzySet)

Returns the synonym that has the highest degree of membership Fuzzy.

Parameters:
fuzzySet - String[][] containing in the first index the degrees and the second index the synonym.
Returns:
String containing synonymous with the highest degree.
